initializeData.name: initializeData
initializeData.processRule: { contextVar.workOrderId = contextVar.workOrderTaskData[0].workOrderId; contextVar.startEndJson = contextVar.workOrderTaskData[0].startEndJson; contextVar.appointmentWindowId = contextVar.workOrderTaskData[0].appointmentWindowId; contextVar.startDate = contextVar.workOrderTaskData[0].startDate; contextVar.dueDate = contextVar.workOrderTaskData[0].dueDate; }

processTaskData.name: processTaskData
processTaskData.processRule: { if (contextVar.taskDetail !== '' && typeof contextVar.taskDetail !== 'undefined' && contextVar.taskDetail.length > 0) { contextVar.taskData = []; contextVar.appointmentData = []; contextVar.breakdownData = []; contextVar.taskId = contextVar.taskDetail[0].id; contextVar.recommendedTechId = contextVar.taskDetail[0].acPrimaryAppraiserId; contextVar.scheduledDate = contextVar.data.actualStartTime; contextVar.statusId = 'workOrderTaskScheduled'; contextVar.acIsPreAssigned = 'Yes'; contextVar.duration = contextVar.data.estimatedTaskDuration; contextVar.workOrderTaskSubAction = 'upsertWorkOrderTask'; } }

setData.name: setData
setData.processRule: { if (contextVar.appointData.length > 0) { contextVar.startDate = contextVar.appointData[0].startDate; } contextVar.endDate = new Date(contextVar.startDate); contextVar.endDate.setMinutes(contextVar.endDate.getMinutes() + contextVar.duration); contextVar.endDate = contextVar.endDate.toISOString().replace('T', ' ').replace('Z', ''); contextVar.taskData.push({ 'scheduledDate': contextVar.startDate, 'statusId': contextVar.statusId, 'eventType': 'workOrderTaskScheduled', 'dueDate': contextVar.endDate, 'acIsApptConfirmed':true, 'acIsPreAssigned': contextVar.acIsPreAssigned, 'assignedToUserId': contextVar.recommendedTechId, 'id': contextVar.taskId }); contextVar.breakdownData.push({ 'startDate': contextVar.startDate, 'endDate': contextVar.endDate, 'workOrderTaskId': contextVar.taskId, 'duration': contextVar.duration, 'id': '' }); }

processAppointmentData.name: processAppointmentData
processAppointmentData.processRule: { if (contextVar.taskAppointmentWindowData !== '' && typeof contextVar.taskAppointmentWindowData !== 'undefined' && contextVar.taskAppointmentWindowData.length > 0) { contextVar.appointmentId = contextVar.taskAppointmentWindowData[0].id; } if(contextVar.appointmentId !== '' && contextVar.appointmentId !== 'undefined'){ contextVar.taskData.push({ 'scheduledDate': contextVar.startDate, 'statusId': contextVar.statusId, 'eventType': 'workOrderTaskScheduled', 'acIsApptConfirmed': true, 'dueDate': contextVar.dueDate, 'acIsPreAssigned': contextVar.acIsPreAssigned, 'assignedToUserId': contextVar.recommendedTechId, 'id': contextVar.taskId }); contextVar.appointmentData.push({ 'workOrderTaskId': contextVar.taskId, 'startEndJson': contextVar.startEndJson, 'startDate': contextVar.startDate, 'id':contextVar.appointmentId, 'endDate': contextVar.endDate, 'appointmentWindowId': contextVar.appointmentWindowId }); contextVar.breakdownData.push({ 'startDate': contextVar.startDate, 'endDate': contextVar.endDate, 'workOrderTaskId': contextVar.taskId, 'duration': contextVar.duration, 'id': '' }); } else{ contextVar.taskData.push({ 'scheduledDate': contextVar.startDate, 'statusId': contextVar.statusId, 'eventType': 'workOrderTaskScheduled', 'acIsApptConfirmed': true, 'dueDate': contextVar.dueDate, 'acIsPreAssigned': contextVar.acIsPreAssigned, 'assignedToUserId': contextVar.recommendedTechId, 'id': contextVar.taskId }); contextVar.appointmentData.push({ 'workOrderTaskId': contextVar.taskId, 'startEndJson': contextVar.startEndJson, 'startDate': contextVar.startDate, 'endDate': contextVar.endDate, 'appointmentWindowId': contextVar.appointmentWindowId }); contextVar.breakdownData.push({ 'startDate': contextVar.startDate, 'endDate': contextVar.endDate, 'workOrderTaskId': contextVar.taskId, 'duration': contextVar.duration, 'id': '' }); } }

processInitialData.name: processInitialData
processInitialData.processRule: { if (typeof contextVar.defaultInputContext !== 'undefined') { for (const key in contextVar.defaultInputContext) { contextVar[key] = contextVar.defaultInputContext[key]; } } contextVar.taskData = []; contextVar.breakdownData = []; var dueDate = new Date(contextVar.data.actualStartTime); dueDate.setMinutes(dueDate.getMinutes() + contextVar.data.estimatedTaskDuration); contextVar.dueDate = dueDate.toISOString().replace('T', ' ').replace('Z', ''); contextVar.taskId = contextVar.data.id; contextVar.recommendedTechId = contextVar.data.assignedToUserId; contextVar.scheduledDate = contextVar.data.actualStartTime; contextVar.statusId = 'workOrderTaskScheduled'; contextVar.acIsPreAssigned = 'Yes'; contextVar.duration = contextVar.data.estimatedTaskDuration; contextVar.workOrderTaskSubAction = 'upsertWorkOrderTask'; }
